item.description: BRICS members explore stablecoin payments and a platform to conduct CBDC payments, aiming to enhance financial cooperation, a Russian official says. Stablecoins might become a tool for international settlements among BRICS members, as the alliance has already set up a…

item.title: Swiss Bitcoin advocates launch campaign to include BTC in National Bank reserves
item.dc:creator: Rony Roy
item.description: Multiple Swiss Bitcoin advocates are spearheading a renewed campaign to persuade the Swiss National Bank to include Bitcoin (BTC) in its reserves through a constitutional referendum. Yves Bennaïm, who leads the non-profit think tank 2B4CH driving this initiative, argued that…

item.title: Coin Center says Senate-presented stablecoin bill poses risks to innovation and free speech
